title: A Blow, a kiss
creator_credit: Rey Carlson, Rhonda Schepisi, Helene Nicol and Great Southern Films
brief_description: A 10 year old boy and his father help an injured man who has crashed his motorcycle. The boy is confused and deeply affected by the reactions of both his father and the father of the motorcyclist, in the face of this trauma. Based on a short story by Tim Winton.
creator_credit_for_label: Rey Carlson, Rhonda Schepisi, Helene Nicol and Great Southern Films
